casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF the Hon. Robert L. CICALE, a Judge of the District Court, Suffolk County. No. 91 Court of Appeals of New York. Decided May 8, 2018 William D. Wexler, North Babylon, for Hon. Robert L. Cicale.

OPINION OF THE COURT

On consideration of the continuation of this Court's April 2, 2018 suspension, with pay, of Honorable Robert L. Cicale from the office of Judge of District Court, Suffolk County, it is determined that the suspension continue, with pay, effective immediately.

Chief Judge DiFiore and Judges Rivera, Stein, Fahey, Garcia, Wilson and Feinman concur.
